Home Answers.com > Wiki Answers > Categories > Food&Cooking > Restaurants and Dining Establishments > Where do restaurants order their food from? Where do restaurants order their food from? Answer It! In: Restaurants and Dining Establishments , Fast Food , Mumbai [ Edit categories ]
Relevant answers:
How do you order in a restaurant ? There are a few ways to order in a restaurant. Some have waiters to serve and ask what you like. There are buffet tables in some restaurants where you get up and pick what you want from prepared... What is in fast food restaurant food ? It is helpful to understand what the government allows in feed or to be used in conventional production: Dairy cows - antibiotics, pig&chicken byproducts, hormones (for growth), pesticides,... Is it illegal to rap an order at a fast food restaurant ? Yes, you're stalling the ordering process. What do you order from in a restaurant ? You are given a menu after you are seated, and there you can find a selection of different varieties of food, and you can order whatever you want, according to what type of food you like to eat or... How it food precessed for fast food restaurants ? It is cooked/baked/fried/prepared, held in some sort of unit heating cabinet, warmer, or landing zone, then served when it's ordered.
